\*not emphasized*
\<br/> not a tag
\[not a link](/foo)
\`not code`
1\. not a list
\* not a list
\# not a header
\[foo]: /url "not a reference"
.

&lt;br/&gt; not a tag

`not code`
1. not a list
* not a list
# not a header
